column4: is it bad if i open up my xorg.conf and don't see a "Section "Module""?
Xorg doeas so much automatically now that the default xorg.conf is basically the same as having none at all
ok, i'm trying to fix flickering in conky and it told me to add load "dbe" under that section, so I was wondering if it was ok to add that section myself
I don't think that 915resolution is needed / usefull with the current drivers
